descriptionHtml:
A very small Gypsy Type Caravan, located south east of redwater den (from the Dawnguard DLC)
Owned by a female Kajit named Kaera who, after an extreme addiction to skooma has left her cart to go live in Redwater den
This mod is still in BETA as i am still learning how to do things, im planning on adding a small quest to get the key to the cart, i will fully voice act Kaera (or try to...) 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57394/?]I used this resource by Tamira for the skooma pipes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36499/?]and modular crafting tables by Tueffle[/url]
i will find a link to the moon sugar jars but I've looked for about half an hour and cant find it but i will look again later

use this for whatever, just as long as you give creds and tell me about it so i can have a nosy:3

Requires:
Base Game
DawnGuard
Dragonborn 
not sure about Heartfire
author: ChloeBeckett
